original_title: A Música Audaz de Toninho Horta
overview: Documentary about the work of the musician and composer Toninho Horta, master of harmonies and instrumentalist whose recognition crosses the borders of  Brazil. The documentary follows the main steps of its trajectory at different stages in the history of Brazilian popular music, depicting moments of his career.
tagline: Toninho Horta, violão, MPB, guitar, jazz
title: The Audaz Music of Toninho Horta
